hero.title: UAE Services
hero.headline: Empowering the UAE as the Global Hub of Trade Integrity
hero.subtext: CEPA-aligned transparency programs that strengthen food security, market confidence, and regional leadership.

context.title: Strategic Context
paragraphs: The UAE’s trade leadership and import profile position it to set global norms on product transparency.
Aligning transparency with CEPA and national food security goals helps raise quality, protect consumers, and accelerate market trust.

items.name: Hedamo Report
items.text: Policy-ready live reports for imports and re-exports—provenance, health context, and claims presented clearly for agencies and buyers.

items.name: Hedamo AI
items.text: Program planning and risk signals for ministries and nominated entities—prioritize products, suppliers, and categories efficiently.

items.name: Hedamo Code
items.text: Instant consumer clarity via secure scans—multilingual, accessible, and consistent across retailers and channels.

benefits.title: Key Benefits
bullets: Support national food security and CEPA-linked policy goals
Enable import programs with consistent, live transparency
Enhance consumer trust and regional reputation
Accelerate approvals and reduce ambiguity for buyers

vision.title: Success Vision
vision.text: By 2030, the UAE stands as the regional standard-setter for ethical, transparent trade, with Hedamo powering live clarity for agencies, buyers, and consumers.

cta.blurb: Live, interactive reports—policy, buyer, and consumer views.
